title: HDFC Bank announces 15% dividend, board approves stock buyback
content: HDFC Bank Ltd announced a 15% dividend payout and approved a stock buyback program worth Rs 5,000 crores. The board meeting held today approved the decision.
raw_text: HDFC Bank Ltd announced a 15% dividend payout and approved a stock buyback program worth Rs 5,000 crores.

title: RBI raises repo rate by 25bps to 6.75%, citing inflation concerns
content: The Reserve Bank of India increased the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.75% in its monetary policy meeting, citing persistent inflation concerns.
raw_text: RBI increases repo rate by 25 basis points to combat inflation

title: ICICI Bank opens 500 new branches across Tier-2 cities
content: ICICI Bank expanded its retail footprint by inaugurating 500 new branches in Tier-2 cities across India to tap into growing rural demand.
raw_text: ICICI Bank opens 500 new branches across Tier-2 cities

title: Banking sector NPAs decline to 5-year low, credit growth at 16%
content: Indian banking sector's non-performing assets have declined to their lowest level in five years, while credit growth accelerated to 16% year-on-year.
raw_text: Banking sector NPAs decline to 5-year low, credit growth at 16%

title: Reserve Bank hikes interest rates by 0.25% in surprise move
content: In an unexpected decision, the Reserve Bank of India raised interest rates by 25 basis points, signaling a hawkish stance on monetary policy.
raw_text: Reserve Bank hikes interest rates by 0.25% in surprise move

title: Central bank raises policy rate 25bps, signals hawkish stance
content: The central bank increased the policy rate by 25 basis points and indicated a continued focus on inflation control in its policy statement.
raw_text: Central bank raises policy rate 25bps, signals hawkish stance

title: Reliance Industries Q3 profit surges 25% on strong retail growth
content: Reliance Industries reported a 25% increase in quarterly profits, driven by robust performance in its retail and telecom divisions.
raw_text: Reliance Industries Q3 profit surges 25% on strong retail growth

title: TCS wins $500 million deal from UK banking giant
content: Tata Consultancy Services secured a five-year, $500 million contract from a major UK bank to modernize its digital infrastructure.
raw_text: TCS wins $500 million deal from UK banking giant

title: Infosys announces 10% salary hike for employees
content: Infosys announced a 10% average salary increase for all employees, effective from January 2026, amid strong demand for IT services.
raw_text: Infosys announces 10% salary hike for employees

title: Adani Green Energy commissions 200MW solar plant in Rajasthan
content: Adani Green Energy commissioned a 200MW solar power plant in Rajasthan, expanding its renewable energy capacity.
raw_text: Adani Green Energy commissions 200MW solar plant in Rajasthan

title: State Bank of India cuts lending rates by 10 basis points
content: SBI reduced its lending rates by 10 basis points across all categories, making loans more affordable for borrowers.
raw_text: State Bank of India cuts lending rates by 10 basis points

title: Wipro bags multi-year cloud transformation deal worth $700M
content: Wipro secured a multi-year cloud transformation contract worth $700 million from a Fortune 500 company.
raw_text: Wipro bags multi-year cloud transformation deal worth $700M

title: Mahindra & Mahindra launches new electric SUV range
content: M&M unveiled its new electric SUV lineup with four models, targeting the premium EV segment in India.
raw_text: Mahindra & Mahindra launches new electric SUV range

title: Bharti Airtel acquires 5G spectrum for Rs 43,000 crores
content: Bharti Airtel won 5G spectrum in multiple bands for Rs 43,000 crores in the latest government auction.
raw_text: Bharti Airtel acquires 5G spectrum for Rs 43,000 crores

title: SEBI proposes stricter disclosure norms for mutual funds
content: The Securities and Exchange Board of India proposed enhanced disclosure requirements for mutual fund schemes.
raw_text: SEBI proposes stricter disclosure norms for mutual funds

title: JSW Steel posts record quarterly production
content: JSW Steel reported its highest-ever quarterly steel production at 6.5 million tonnes.
raw_text: JSW Steel posts record quarterly production

title: Zomato acquires quick commerce startup for $300 million
content: Zomato completed the acquisition of a quick commerce delivery startup for $300 million to strengthen its delivery network.
raw_text: Zomato acquires quick commerce startup for $300 million

title: Coal India increases production target by 10%
content: Coal India Ltd raised its annual production target by 10% to meet rising energy demand.

title: Tata Motors exports 50,000 EVs to European markets
content: Tata Motors shipped 50,000 electric vehicles to European markets, marking a major milestone in its global expansion.

title: HUL reports 8% revenue growth in Q3
content: Hindustan Unilever Limited posted 8% revenue growth in the third quarter driven by rural demand recovery.

title: Asian Paints raises prices by 3% across portfolio
content: Asian Paints announced a 3% price increase across its product range citing higher raw material costs.

title: NTPC commissions 800MW thermal power unit
content: NTPC successfully commissioned an 800MW thermal power unit in Chhattisgarh, adding to national generation capacity.

title: Dr Reddy's launches generic cancer drug in US market
content: Dr Reddy's Laboratories launched a generic version of a cancer treatment drug in the United States.

title: Bajaj Auto sales jump 18% in November on festive demand
content: Bajaj Auto reported an 18% increase in November sales driven by strong festive season demand.

title: ITC invests Rs 2,000 crores in new food processing plant

title: Tech Mahindra partners with Microsoft for AI solutions

title: Sun Pharma receives USFDA approval for diabetes drug

title: Power Grid Corporation invests in renewable energy transmission
content: Power Grid Corporation announced investments in building transmission infrastructure for renewable energy projects.

title: UltraTech Cement acquires competitor for Rs 3,500 crores
content: UltraTech Cement completed the acquisition of a regional cement manufacturer for Rs 3,500 crores.

title: Maruti Suzuki plans Rs 4,500 crore expansion in Gujarat
